summary: Completed comprehensive testing of McCare Global ATS Lead Capture system with HubSpot-like lead intake capabilities. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate), frontend mostly functional with one minor embed code display issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Embed code textarea appears empty despite backend API returning correct embed code

issues: Chart dimension warnings in console - width/height calculation issues

passed_tests: Lead Capture Settings endpoint and UI tab
API Endpoints tab showing all 4 required endpoints
Audit Log functionality with proper lead intake tracking
Leads Pipeline Kanban board with color-coded source badges
Lead intake statistics and source distribution
Cross-source lead visibility in unified pipeline
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (10/10 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (1 minor UI issue)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix embed code display issue in LeadCaptureSettingsPage - the backend API returns correct embed code but frontend textarea shows empty. Check React state management and data binding for embed code in the Embed Form tab.
